properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Apahasinchunatti prajalu kurchundedu Aa chota kurchundaka yunduvaade dhanyudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaa darmasastramandu anandinchuchu Yallappudu dyanamu cheyuvade dhanyudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kaaluva neetiyora nathadu naatabadi thana Kaalamuna phalinchu chettuvale yundunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aaku vadani chettuvale nathadundunu Ayana cheyunadiyella saphalamagunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dhusta janulu a vidhamuga nundaka Pottuvale gaaliki chedaragottabadudhuru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nyaya vimarsa sabhalayandu dhustajanulu Neetimantula sabhalo paapulunu niluvaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nethimanthula maargamu Yehova yerugunu Nadupunu dustula dhari nashanamunaku{/lang-eng}
